item.title: Fake News Discovery - Machine Learning & Data Analysis
item.description:
ðŸ“° This project explores misinformation detection in social media using machine learning and data visualization.

ðŸ›  Tools Used

  • Programming: Python, Jupyter Notebook
  • Machine Learning: NLP, Scikit-learn
  • Data Processing: Pandas, NumPy, Excel
  • Data Visualization: Tableau

ðŸ§  Machine Learning Workflow

graph LR A[Raw Social Media Data] --> B[Text Preprocessing] B --> C[NLP Techniques] C --> D[Feature Extraction] D --> E[Train/Test Split] E --> F[Model Training] F --> G[Evaluation] G --> H[Prediction]
